style: .psd-item-table-card{position:relative;background:#fff;border:1px solid var(--gray-200);border-radius:14px;padding:14px 14px 10px;box-shadow:0 3px 14px rgba(15,23,42,.05)}.psd-item-table-header{font-size:16px;font-weight:700;margin-bottom:2px}.psd-item-table-sub{color:var(--text-muted);font-size:11px;margin-bottom:8px}.psd-item-table-wrap{overflow:auto;max-height:420px}.psd-item-table{width:100%;border-collapse:collapse;font-size:12px}.psd-item-table th,.psd-item-table td{padding:8px 10px;border-bottom:1px solid var(--gray-100)}.psd-item-table thead th{position:sticky;top:0;background:#fff;z-index:1}.psd-item-table tfoot th{background:#fafafa;font-weight:700}.psd-item-table-empty{text-align:center;color:var(--text-muted);padding:16px}
